## Maine

> 1996.1월부터 2006.8 미국 maine 주의 월별 실업률


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.2 ──
✔ ggplot2 3.4.1     ✔ purrr   1.0.1
✔ tibble  3.1.8     ✔ dplyr   1.1.0
✔ tidyr   1.3.0     ✔ stringr 1.5.0
✔ readr   2.1.4     ✔ forcats 1.0.0
── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ──
✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter()
✖ dplyr::lag()    masks stats::lag()
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(data.table)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```

Attaching package: 'data.table'

The following objects are masked from 'package:dplyr':

    between, first, last

The following object is masked from 'package:purrr':

    transpose
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(ggplot2)
library(ggfortify)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Maine <- fread('./timeseries/Maine.txt')
Maine %>% head()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
   unemploy
1:      6.7
2:      6.7
3:      6.4
4:      5.9
5:      5.2
6:      4.8
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
str(Maine)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
Classes 'data.table' and 'data.frame':	128 obs. of  1 variable:
 $ unemploy: num  6.7 6.7 6.4 5.9 5.2 4.8 4.8 4 4.2 4.4 ...
 - attr(*, ".internal.selfref")=<externalptr> 
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
class(Maine)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "data.table" "data.frame"
```
:::
:::



## ts객체로 변환
**ts(data, start, end, frequency = 12, ...)**


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Maine.ts <- ts(Maine$unemploy, start = c(1996,1), frequency = 12)
class(Maine.ts)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "ts"
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(Maine.ts)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](2023-03-03-arima_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-6-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
Maine.2000 <- window(Maine.ts, start = c(2000,1))
plot(Maine.2000)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](2023-03-03-arima_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-7-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cbe <- fread('./timeseries/cbe.txt')
cbe %>% head()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
   choc beer elec
1: 1451 96.3 1497
2: 2037 84.4 1463
3: 2477 91.2 1648
4: 2785 81.9 1595
5: 2994 80.5 1777
6: 2681 70.4 1824
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
choc.ts <- ts(cbe$choc, start = 1958, freq=12)
beer.ts <- ts(cbe$beer, start = 1968, freq=12)
elec.ts <- ts(cbe$elec, start = 1968, freq=12)

plot(cbind(choc.ts, beer.ts, elec.ts), main='')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](2023-03-03-arima_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-9-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
cbe %>% 
  ts(start = 1958, freq=12) %>% 
  autoplot(facets = T)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](2023-03-03-arima_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-10-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global <- fread('./timeseries/global.txt')
global %>% head()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
       V1     V2     V3     V4     V5
1: -0.384 -0.457 -0.673 -0.344 -0.311
2: -0.071 -0.246 -0.235 -0.380 -0.418
3: -0.670 -0.386 -0.437 -0.150 -0.528
4: -0.692 -0.629 -0.363 -0.375 -0.328
5: -0.495 -0.646 -0.754 -0.137 -0.452
6: -1.031 -0.643 -0.328 -0.311 -0.263
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global_s <- scan('./timeseries/global.txt')
global_s %>% head()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] -0.384 -0.457 -0.673 -0.344 -0.311 -0.071
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global_s %>% glimpse()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 num [1:1800] -0.384 -0.457 -0.673 -0.344 -0.311 -0.071 -0.246 -0.235 -0.38 -0.418 ...
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
plot(global_s, type = 'l')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](2023-03-03-arima_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-14-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global.ts <- ts(global_s, start = c(1856, 1), freq = 12)
plot(global.ts, main='')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](2023-03-03-arima_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-15-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
autoplot(global.ts)
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](2023-03-03-arima_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-16-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::



### 회귀직선 추가

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
new.time <- time(global.ts) # t+(i-1)/freq
plot(global.ts, main='')
abline(lm(global.ts~new.time), col = 'red')
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](2023-03-03-arima_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-17-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
global.ts %>% str()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
 Time-Series [1:1800] from 1856 to 2006: -0.384 -0.457 -0.673 -0.344 -0.311 -0.071 -0.246 -0.235 -0.38 -0.418 ...
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#autoplot(global.ts) +
 # geom_smooth(method = 'lm')
```
:::
